Module PropertyAnimatorCore
Header /Engine/Plugins/Experimental/PropertyAnimatorCore/Source/PropertyAnimatorCore/Public/Animators/PropertyAnimatorCoreBase.h
Include #include "Animators/PropertyAnimatorCoreBase.h"

Syntax

UCLASS (MinimalAPI, Abstract, EditInlineNew, AutoExpandCategories=("Animator"))  
class UPropertyAnimatorCoreBase :  
    public UObject,  
    public IPropertyAnimatorCorePresetable

Remarks

Abstract base class for any Animator, holds a set of linked properties
